scripts.dev:electron: node scripts/ensure-electron.cjs && wait-on http://127.0.0.1:3001 && env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron .
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n next,electron -c blue,green "npm run dev:next" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dist:linux: node scripts/ensure-electron.cjs && npm run build:next && npm run prepare:next && env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron-builder --linux AppImage
scripts.dist:rpm: node scripts/ensure-electron.cjs && npm run build:next && npm run prepare:next && env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron-builder --linux rpm
